list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "lhm" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "lhm" WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "lhm" WITH KEY = "hardware_name" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND hardware_type =~ /Gpu/
list.label: GPU
list.name: gpu
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "lhm" WITH KEY = "hardware_name" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND hardware_type =~ /Gpu/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "lhm" WITH KEY = "hardware_name" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND hardware_type =~ /Storage/
